transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello Sumit sir, very good morning.
Customer: Haanji Raju, very good morning. Kaise hain sir aap?
Executive: Main theek hoon. Busy hain kya kahin aap bhi aap?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan haan main bilkul theek hoon beta.
Executive: Okay. So actually maine call kiya hai na ki ye jo buylead ka jo issue chal raha tha na.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Maine is point pe baat kari hai. Toh main chahta hoon ki sir aap ek baar video meeting pe aa kar ke ek baar history.
Customer: Mujhe, nahi nahi main toh dekh lunga lekin team toh kaam toh unko hi karna hai. Team ko hi karna hai.
Executive: Problem pata hai kya hai? Main is baat ko agree kar raha hoon sir team ko hi kaam karna hai. But team mein ho chahe main baat karu aap ek baar waha pe rahenge na saamne toh main bas aapko dikhana chahta hoon ki sir ispe kya kyunki jo team hai na woh pata hai kya keh rahi hain? Woh ye keh rahe hain ki mujhe hotel lock, smart door lock aur unki cards ki lock ki mujhe chahiye zyada sir. Theek hai na? Toh maine unko ye samjhane ki koshish kari hai ki sir dekhiye kya hai ki hamare catalog mein digital door lock se lekar ke hotel keys card switch pe tak ki leads hamare paas catalog mein hamari categories add hain. Toh hum, hamara jo main focus hota hai ki hum koshish karte hain ki hum direct inquiry indirect buyer ko hum aapko hotel lock, card lock aur smart door lock ki de aur uski buylead jitni generate hoti hai main aapko deta hoon. Theek hai na? But hota kya hai ki hamare paas aur bhi kyunki category hamare catalog mein hai toh hum un sabhi categories ki bhi leads hum aapke paas transfer karte hain. Theek hai? Toh abhi toh ab ab aata hai dusra point unka ye kehna hai ki mere paas zyadatar retail buyleads zyada aa rahi hain. One piece ki, do piece ki aa rahi thi. Theek hai? Toh maine ye dekha, unke bihaf pe maine ek feedback and team mein baat kari aur apne seniors se bhi baat kari ki sir inke paas keval retail ki aa rahi hai. Toh woh keh rahe hain ki ek baar dekho ki buylead consumption pattern kaisa hai unka. Theek hai? Toh humne ye dekha toh waha pe achi baat ye thi ki aapki jo team hai woh kal unhone lagbhag aath ya nau buyleads consume kari thi. Theek hai? Usme inhone jo jitni pieces ki quantity thi keval ek aath mein se keval ek buylead aisi thi jo ki 30 pieces ki thi. Baaki jo thi woh chaar piece, paanch piece, 10 piece aur 20 piece ki thi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ab consumption ab kyunki unka ye hai ki woh jitni woh nahi chahte hain ki mere paas har samay bulk wali show ho. Theek hai? Toh maine unko ye samjhane ki koshish kari hai sir dekhiye market mein hum hain aur hamare alawa baaki competitor bhi hain. Theek hai? Aur ek buylead keval paanch supplier hi consume kar sakte hain. Paanch leads mein wohi buylead show ho rahi hai. Paanch leads ka ek hum option dete hain ki agar buylead generate nahi hoti toh main aapko dikhata nahi waha pe. Theek hai? Main aapko yehi request kar raha hoon sir ki ek baar aap ek baar video meeting pe aate hain na. Mujhe, ek hi baat batao agar hum saare, theek hai catalog mein bahut saare product add hain toh keyword lene ka kya fayda hua mujhe ye bata do.
Executive: Keyword batata hoon. Sir keyword lene ka fayda ye hua ki sir usme hum aapki visibility enhance karte hain. Keyword lene ka ek motive. Nahi nahi visibility isliye toh enhance karte hain ki waha se lead hame zyada milengi.
Customer: Bilkul same product ki. Ussi toh hume lead nahi mil rahi hai toh. Nahi nahi woh waha se toh mil nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi ab suniye yehi clear karna chahunga. Toh uss category mein agar main baat karu aapko ye bhi dikha du ki sir hamare paas sabse zyada buylead humne jo consume kari hai na woh smart door lock ki kari hai lagbhag 790 last six months mein.
Customer: Haan toh woh nahi aa rahi hai tabhi, suno suno nahi aa rahi hai tabhi toh woh raise kiya hai jo keywords liye hain. Keywords ke according hamari buylead nahi aa rahi hai aur aap keh rahe hain na top ranking mein dikhane ke liye. Top ranking mein isliye dikha rahe hain kyunki waha se hame buylead mile. Waha se buylead inquiry direct. Direct inquiry aa rahi hai direct buyer ko. Inquiry bilkul inquiry bilkul hai hi nahi.
Executive: Inquiry maine check kiya tha sir. Theek hai na? Main is baat ko agree karte chalunga ki aap keh rahe hain ki inquiry nahi hai. Maine ye notice kiya hai sir ki aapke portal pe na jo direct inquiry generate ho rahi hai woh hotel lock ki, card lock ki, RFID lock ki aur ye hotel lock safe locker ki zyada inquiry generate ho rahi hai. Theek hai? Smart door lock agar aap khud bhi dekhiye isliye main aapse request isliye kar raha hoon. Zyada toh ho hi nahi rahi. Zyada toh kisi cheez ki nahi ho rahi. Ho hi nahi rahi inquiry.
Customer: Haan. Usko lekar abhi main aapse bata raha hoon jis point pe main jo batana chahta hoon na woh main aapse isliye request karna chahta hoon sir mujhe pata hai ki aap thoda sa busy schedule mein ho. Theek hai na? But main aapse request karunga ki ek baar mujhe aaj ka time dijiye. Ek baar matlab keval 10 minute ka time dijiye. Main chahta hoon jo main batana chahta hoon aapko. Aap mujhe bata toh do ki ye time isliye hai batao. Main isliye ki bhai main ye batana chaunga main yehi se baat kar dunga explain kar dunga main.
Executive: Theek hai. Ab dekhiye do cheeze hain sir ki pehla ye ki hum buylead kabhi bhi aisa nahi hai ki hum aapne jis category mein lead list listing di hui hai. Uss uss category ki listing mein aap khud bhi identify kariyega ki aapke paas baaki kisi aur category yani hotel card switch ki nahi aati kisi aur category ki nahi aate zyada tar inquiry aapke paas jo zyada tar inquiry aati hai smart door lock ki.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Smart door lock ki, hotel lock ki aur card lock ki aur digital door lock ki. Agar aap inquiry dekhenge apna na waha pe inquiry zarur dekhiyega. Main ye zarur kahunga sir haan agar aapke paas aapke paas 100 inquiry generate ho rahi hai for example. Theek hai? Un 100 mein se lagbhag lagbhag 10 ya 20 aisi inquiry hongi jo ki other categories ki hongi. Baaki 80% aapki inquiry aapke listed category ki hogi kyunki ussi category mein aapki visibility hai market pe. Theek hai? Ab aata hai dusra buylead ki baat.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aap busy ho kya sir? Wrong time pe maine call kar diya aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi haan.
Executive: Bolo bolo.
Executive: Theek hai. Are time toh nikalna padega aapko. Main samajh raha hoon. Main samajh raha hoon sir ki busy rehta hai busy rehte ho aap aur isliye time nahi de paate hain. Okay. So basically maine wohi bataya ki aap inquiry dekhiyega and do cheeze aur dekhiyega sir ki main ye zarur kehta hoon ki aapke paas jo buyer calls ka flow hona chahiye uss prakar ki buyer calls ki flow nahi hai. But hota kya hai ki aapke Aligarh se lagbhag 10 se 15 10 log ke aas paas hamare waha listed hain. Theek hai? Ab listed hai toh usme bhi do category ki main listed hai pehla ye all India level pe hamare paas bhi agar main baat karta hoon hotel lock ki toh all India level pe visible hai. Suno suno main yehi pe aapko rokunga ki aap keh rahe ho ki 10 se 12 log listed hain isliye shayad inquiry kam rehti hain. Yehi kehna chah rahe ho?
Executive: Inquiry kam nahi rehti hain. Aapke paas flow aata hai baaki aur other category ki generate hoti hai toh hum other category ki bhi aapki dete hain. Aapke paas dete hain. Toh mera main focus ye nahi hai. Main ye nahi kehna chahta aapko ki nahi sir hamari is wali category mein inquiry kam hai chahe iske baad is wali category mein buylead kam hai nahi. Kabhi nahi. Sir buylead generate ho rahi hai. Woh buyleads hum jo consume nahi kar pa rahe woh sold out ho rahi hai jiski wajah se consume nahi kar pa rahe hain. Woh sold out ka jo issue chal raha hai sir woh within five seconds ke andar chal raha hai aur yaha pe na hi aapki galti hai na hi IndiaMART kyunki humne jab ye baat kari apne seniors se toh unhone ye kaha. Unhone ye kaha unhone ye kaha ki dekhiye buylead hum generate kar rahe hain kyunki high competitive product hone ki wajah se woh sold out jaldi ho raha hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Isme supplier ki koi galti nahi hai. Dekho Raju main ek cheez main bataunga humne package ke liye paise diye hain business ke paise diye hain. Meri baat suno main ek do teen cheezon mein hi baat ko khatam karunga. Humne package liya hai aap service de rahe hain. Best service ke liye aapne commitment kiya hua hai ki best service denge. Best service nahi mil rahi tabhi ticket baar baar open ho rahi hai. Dusri baat team hai mere neeche mujhe unki nahi sunta hoon main woh jab ye kehte hain ki bhai turnover kam hai month ka kitna sale nikla hai kitna support mein kya problem aa rahi hai support itni problem kyun nahi. Mujhe toh report chahiye hoti hai. Ab unka work mujhe chahiye main ki mujhe nahi pata tum kaise karoge. Mere ko sirf chahiye kaam. Bilkul bilkul sir bilkul.
Executive: Bilkul aap.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kaam kyun nahi ho raha? Haan mujhe toh chahiye ab woh unka part hai ki bhai kyun kaam nahi ho raha toh woh aapko karte hain na kahin kahin. Wahi toh wahi baat hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Toh main wohi batana chahta hoon. Main wohi batana chahta hoon ki sir woh buyleads jo consume kar rahe hain na woh buyleads jis jis prakar ki unko chahiye bulk buylead chahiye woh bulk buylead bhi consume kar rahe hain. Wohi main aapko dikhana chahta hoon ki sir hum bulk buylead consume kar pa rahe hain lekin point ye hai ki hum iski woh chahte hain ki mujhe woh jitni leads hamare paas show ho rahi hain woh bulk mein hi show ho. Theek hai na? Toh woh possible. Bulk mein ho aur dekho haan woh jo main keyword hai uske according hame uski leads zyada show ho jabki unki lead aa hi nahi rahi hain hamare paas. Aaj toh duniya bhar ke duniya bhar ki lead aa rahi hain lekin unke leads nahi aa rahi hain.
Executive: Okay uss baat pe bhi aa jata hoon. Toh maine is uss point pe bhi unhone bataya tha ki mere paas is category ki buyleads nahi aa rahi. Toh maine unse ye kaha ki sir dekhiye abhi kal ki main baat karta hoon toh kal pe humne total approximately buylead jo consume kari thi woh kari thi nine. Theek hai na? Isme se jo haan. Bata raha hoon wohi bata raha hoon sir wohi bata raha hoon. Ek hai card based lock ka. Theek hai? Dusra hai heavy duty electronic lock karke hai. Tag buyleads bata raha hoon. Fir electronic door lock karke hai. Fir aapka hai digital door lock karke hai. Theek hai na? Ye digital door lock fir se again ek aur karke hai jo ki Jahanabad se hai. Uske alawa digital door lock karke buylead hai jo consume ki gayi hai. Uske alawa Godrej Magna hotel lock karke hai. Uske alawa biometric smart door lock hai. Theek hai? Fingerprint door lock hai. Ye ye buyleads consume ki gayi hain. Nine buyleads consume ki gayi thi. Suno suno suno suno ab meri baat suno. Keywords kaun kaun se hain hamare? Teen keyword chal rahe hain?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Teen keyword ke saath saath aapka basic wala bhi chal raha hai na hum aapko all sabhi products iske chal rahe hain. Agar main bata du aapko kaun kaun se products. Toh in keywords ki lead kaha hai? In keywords ki leads kaha hai? Jab hum in pe hi kaam karte rahenge toh keywords ka kya fayda hua hai?
Executive: Nahi isliye bata raha tha. Main wohi batana chahta hoon sir ki keywords ka listing dene ka matlab ye nahi ki hum aapko buyleads jo de jaise wohi hum aapko dete hi hain. In fact main aapko ye bhi batana chahta hoon ki sir woh sold out ho rahi hain aapko paanch list mein dikh rahi hain. Agar sold out generate nahi hoti toh main aapko seedhe bol deta ki sir is wali category mein hamare paas lead nahi hai. Toh bhaiya hame toh kaam chahiye sold out ho rahi hai ye aapki problem hai aapne uss time pe package diya tha ye keh ke nahi diya tha ki ye sold out ho jayenge toh hum usme kuch nahi karenge. Hame toh ye keh ke diya tha acha business denge acha business nahi mil raha ticket raise ho rahi hai. Baat khatam agar aisa hi chalta raha ye suno suno agar aisa hi chalta raha toh kuch din baad ye package hum renew nahi karenge. Hum kyun itna paise lagayenge IndiaMART pe fir? Sir woh itna paisa itna paisa itna paisa hum jaha lagayenge woh bahar lagayenge fir hum apni khud ki marketing IndiaMART ke upar dependent kyun rahenge?
Customer: Bilkul sir bilkul sir bilkul.
Executive: Agree sir agree karta hoon aapki baat ko. Main isliye chahta hoon sir aap. Raju meri dekho main do din tak main busy hoon aur chaho toh 23 tarikh ko 23 ka Sunday hai shayad hain? 24th ko 24th ko apne kisi senior se meri baat kara dena. Aaj hi baat karne ke bol rahe the. Explate kar dena. Seedhi si baat hai humne paisa. Aaj hi baat karne ke bol rahe the aap se. Mere se aaj hi baat karne ke liye toh mere ko ek baar do ghante baad call kar lena main apna time manage karke bataunga ki bhai kab main time de sakta hoon. Theek ek baat aur kariyega abhi main dekh raha hoon ki aapke portal pe na buyleads ek baar check karwa lijiyega sir ki yaha pe digital door lock ki aur RFID card lock ki aur smart door lock ki buyleads generate hui hain. 25 ki 15 ki abhi consume nahi ki gayi hai. Theek hai na unse bol dijiye consume kar le. Ye abhi ek ghante pehle generate hui thi. Theek hai na? Unko bol dijiye ab do ghante baad. Hum apne unko boss boss ko bata dijiye ke agar yehi sab kuch chalta raha toh package hamara kab ho raha hai over? Isliye sir main samajh gaya aap nahi chahte. Toh woh package hum nahi karenge renew nahi karenge aage se jitna hai utna toh chala lenge lekin aage se nahi karenge hum ussi hisab se fir abhi se planning kar denge ke bhai hame IndiaMART ke upar dependent na rehna pade.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Agree sir agree sir aapke point pe bhi agree karta hoon. Aap mujhe bas itna kariyega ki mujhe na kyunki sir boss se bol deta hoon ab main 12 baje ka schedule karu fir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: 12 baje ka schedule karta hoon mere manager bhi rahenge theek hai na senior mere. Aur usse woh rahega aap rahenge toh acha rahega theek hai na?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Okay sir. Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Keywords are not generating relevant leads.

- Team is not performing up to expectations.

- Dissatisfied with the service provided by IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead consumption process.

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss the issues.

- Executive assured to check the inquiry generation.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled with senior manager at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, keywords, service, package, renewal
